post.body: Not *that* kind of dirty. ;)
Reply back...I am where I'm supposed to be. You need to be in AA.
Yes, but then you can block the ones you don't want.
@h0neyb Please don't. I'll have to stop following you, or else I'll feel dirty when I read those tweets!
that's a private club, rules are different.
I think you can order beer before noon, just not liquor. not entirely sure though.
My recent ex became an ex over his alcohol use. Thankfully, he wasn't my kids' dad.
http://tinyurl.com/rgzsu
You can. You need to make your profile private though.
I hope the two are unrelated.
I think I tested out of all the classes, but never received my certification for some reason.
@h0neyb I don't!! Ewwwwww!
I don't know, but when they link their Twitter profile to their Twitter profile, my opinion of their IQ drops a lot....
In Utah, at the Depot. I'll get more details out later, but that's the basics.
That sounds wonderful! I'm having a leftover stuffed bell pepper. Might have to make that soup for dinner soon, though.
Thanks for that link. It's given me a lot to think about.
Yeah we get a lot of snow. Utah has some of the best snow to ski or snowboard in the US.
I can't remember the last time I didn't have a white Christmas, being in Utah.
It'll be a while before I have news on that.
Thanks for the info. I'll give it a try.
Amusing, but it won't let me personalize it!
Yeah, so at dinner, oldest son: "Mom, is it true..." Younger son interrupts: "about Santa" Older son: "NO, shhh"
I'm hoping to go, but don't want to buy tix until I have a date, but so far I'm not dating anyone that I think I'd like to take...
I found it through this: http://tinyurl.com/a38ulo
Ack! And I thought my Christmas Eve allergy test was bad....
Haha, I could print that out, buy her the materials and tell her to make it herself. Teehee!
@HappyHealthyPup @nicktjohnson I want to try their veggie burgers, too!
LOL, will do.
They start about $700 there. If that's cheap for a banjo, she's getting nothing for Christmas. LOL
I just open two browsers....
Wow, that video of the rescue is awesome!
Do I have to wait until January 1st to ask you out? :-P
What is your new obsession????
There are not words enough to describe the stupidity. http://is.gd/bonX
Doc gave me Chantix, I'm on my way to being smoke free. Yippeee!
Puppy just tried to share his bone with (evil) kitty, who took a swipe at him for his generosity. A laugh a minute around these guys.
RT @JMBell: Well, this sure ruined my whole damn day - http://tinyurl.com/5jdwmk
My animals have all gone nuts! There's definitely a storm on the way.
I'm making a quit smoking plan. I need social support, tho. I should create a volunteer calendar so everyone can sign up to help, in shifts.
First draft of my article for Equalnox is done! Woot!
My unexpected nap has me running late. My Zucchini Tomato Soup is smelling wonderful, and has about 15 minutes left to simmer.
I need a family law lawyer right NOW. Please DM any recommendations.
Who does Rod Blagojevich look most like? http://is.gd/bPfM
Oh, dear lord! Brian Schweitzer will be the new Chair of the Democratic Governor's Association.
Looking forward to the innaugural ball planning meeting tomorrow. This is going to be SO much fun!
Utah Wine Night, January 31, Formal Party: http://utahwinenite.com/
Today is turning out to be an awesome day. :)
New blog post: Quitting Smoking, Part I: Chantrix http://is.gd/bB2C
The wind stopped at my house (Murray) and the flakes are falling.
Wow, the wind outside sounds deadly!
Fucking UHC insurance! Won't cover Chantix.
I think everyone should read both of these (re: Rick Warren) http://is.gd/dedQ and http://is.gd/d1yf
Wow, I think this guy is serious: http://www.av1611.org/othpubls/santa.html
Who knew that "banjo tan" was a color? http://is.gd/db3Y
Great, both KSL and Craigslist seem to have issues, and I can't place a classified ad for a banjo on either one.
Anyone know where I can find a cheap and/or used banjo? That's the only thing my sister wants for Christmas.
RT @SistersTalk: Don't forget today is Gay Dollar Day! What the hell is that? Learn more: http://is.gd/cDUm (pls RT!)
Asshattery abounds: Preston (8 yr old) arrived without his heart monitor.
WTFFF? Warren to be keybote speaker at MLK Service???? http://tinyurl.com/9gvj9c
The ex and I fought this AM b/c he wouldn't let me have the kids tonight. Guess his plans changed, he just asked me to take them. Asshat.
